channel.title: I was bored, and this is my outcome
channel.description:
my friend made this weird song about a giant egg, so I made a flash movie of it(cheaply) and it makes your IQ -= 5 for every time you watch it :rolleyes: [url=http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/egg.html]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/egg.html[/url] I was bored, so only post comments, not flames :D
it is 58kb, so i isn't that big :o

item.title: I was bored, and this is my outcome
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Hippie_Slay:

pretty pointless/retarded.

yep ;D it sure is, if you did not notice, i was VERY bored at the time

Read full topic

item.title: I was bored, and this is my outcome
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:23, topic:98546”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=141666.msg1363476#msg1363476 date=1179949925]

Daycrawler, stop attacking klop.
Advertising approval is only required for links to other forums.

Frankly, you’re the moron.

[OnTopic]
That was a very… interesting animation, lol. Absolutely random.

No it is required for most sites, especially forums.

Frankly, you’re the moron.

Megan, posts from staff members themselves have stated that it is mostly for forums or any other community related sites.

This would not fall under that category.
Also, i do believe these personal attacks at klop are unnecessary, and unfair. (Not just in this thread, i’ve seen it elsewhere before you attempt to pull me up on that, too.)

Those attacks aren’t unwarranted. IF so, warn me for them.

Unwarranted? Sorry, i’ll go get a warrant to search through them.
ps; Irrelevant to my post, Learn to read.

Now, stfu, I’ve made my point, you were wrong, scoop past it like the good little girl you were meant to be.
Back to the topic at hand.
[/quote]Your were wrong as well.

Dictionaries won’t even explain that.
And what good reason do you have to attack him?[/quote]http://www.thefreedictionary.com/unwarranted

Read full topic
